# NSExtensionItemAttributedContentTextKey

**Global Variable**

An optional string describing the extension item content.

## Declaration

```swift
let NSExtensionItemAttributedContentTextKey: String
```

## Constants

- **NSExtensionItemAttributedTitleKey**: An optional title of the extension item.
- **NSExtensionItemAttachmentsKey**: An optional array of media data associated with the extension item.

items.description: An optional title of the extension item.
